doc.name: callback
doc.synopsis: Javascript action on choosing a token
doc.description: the callback argument for wstoken is in fact the name of a javascript function you can create/choose that will be triggered every time a token has been selected. The id of the wstoken field will be passed to the function.
doc.example:
<wstoken name="tokenfield[]" id="tokener" callback="templateCallBack" placeholder="Choose.." multiple>
</wstoken>

javascript function example :
function mycallbacker(dat) {
   var selected = $("#"+dat).find(':selected'); // Get the selected value(s)
   for (index = 0, len = selected.length; index < len; ++index) {
      // show all selected text and values in the console.
      console.log(selected[index].value + ' :: ' + selected[index].value;
  }
}
